plain: The user's favourite genre is action, as evidenced by the large number of action movies on their list. They also enjoy comedy, as evidenced by the number of comedy movies on their list. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be fast-paced and full of action, as many of their favourite movies fit this description. The user's favourite kind of musical score is likely to be dramatic and action-packed, as many of their favourite movies have such scores. The user's favourite mood for the musical score is likely to be intense and exciting, as many of their favourite movies have such scores. The user's favourite setting is likely to be modern-day, as many of their favourite movies take place in the present day. The user's favourite visual style is likely to be realistic, as many of their favourite movies have such visuals. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be fast-paced and action-packed, as many of their favourite movies have such writing. The user's favourite runtime is likely to be around 2 hours, as many of their favourite movies are this length. The user's favourite themes are likely to be action and adventure, as many of their favourite movies have such themes.
